Name: Cyber Hunter: Awakening
About the game: Destroy all enemies, beware of deadly chasms and grenade launchers. Shoot everyone to destroy crime in your hometown once and for all! Will you be able to defeat all rivals and get to the end? Features: - Old school gameplay - Nice pixel art - Nice soundtrack
